statements: SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users;
SELECT last_name, first_name, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location='New York';
SELECT first_name, birthdate FROM users ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT user_id, interests FROM users WHERE interests LIKE '%Programming%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, interests FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, location FROM users WHERE interests LIKE '%coding%' AND location != 'California';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE first_name ILIKE 'john' OR last_name ILIKE 'smith';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT email, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM ar_marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender='female';
SELECT campaign_name, budget, target_location FROM ar_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM user_profiles WHERE location='New York' AND gender='male' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_type, COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM ar_marketing_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM User_Profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM User_Profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM User_Profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, segment_name FROM User_Segmentation WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%';
SELECT * FROM User_Profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, email_address FROM User_Profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT segment_name, segment_description FROM User_Segmentation;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM User_Profiles JOIN User_Segmentation ON User_Profiles.user_id = User_Segmentation.user_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT u.username, s.segment_name FROM users u JOIN user_segments us ON u.user_id = us.user_id JOIN segments s ON us.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE u.age < 25;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT username, email, age FROM users JOIN profiles ON users.user_id = profiles.user_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT u.username, s.segment_name FROM users u JOIN user_segments us ON u.user_id = us.user_id JOIN segments s ON us.segment_id = s.segment_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(campaign_id) AS campaigns_count FROM user_campaigns GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT u.username, c.campaign_name, s.segment_name FROM users u JOIN user_campaigns uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN campaigns c ON uc.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN campaign_segments cs ON c.campaign_id = cs.campaign_id JOIN user_segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT users.user_id, users.username, campaigns.campaign_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_campaigns ON users.user_id = user_campaigns.user_id INNER JOIN campaigns ON user_campaigns.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT users.username, user_segments.segment_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_segments ON users.user_id = user_segments.segment_id WHERE age >= 25;

SELECT campaigns.campaign_name, campaigns.budget, user_segments.description FROM user_campaigns INNER JOIN campaigns ON user_campaigns.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id INNER JOIN campaign_segments ON user_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_segments.campaign_id INNER JOIN user_segments ON campaign_segments.segment_id = user_segments.segment_id;
